string.text: Hi!
I got some businesses to you...
What do you want?
Where can I earn some money and get an equipment?
What news recently do you have?
Seriy tried to force through block post. Everybody's dead.
I heard one stalker, returned out of Zone, was robbed and killed by militarists. They took an valuable artifact. They say scientists got shocked.
You can get it by Trader in the cellar. There's no more places. You'd better don't disappoint him. He can make the price too high, so you would have to pick

If you need weapon, equipment or a job apply to a Trader living in the village near the blockpost. You can sell him artifacts at profitable prices. You'd better be \na friend of him, the price depends on his relation to you.
I've heard about "Duty" formation-they are Zone's sanitars.
Can you teel me about some things?
What do you want to know?
Can you give some advises to a novice?
I don't really know what can I advise you... I'm not very long time here. The first thing you are to do - to get weapons and equipment.
I need more information
Thanks, enough
Don't have a rest on open countries, beware of anomalies, mutants and bandits, do not attack militarists...and shelter \nduring Emission, otherwise - instant death...
Tell me about Zone
I'm a novice to, I don't know... I'm just getting use to it.
The Zone...it is't a circle 40km in radius, and not even part of the world. It's a new world, with its own laws and oditties.
And what's about soldiers and militarists?
There's olanty of soldiers aroud here, you can kill them only in emergency. Remember trader won't be glad by that kind \nof things.
Soldiers and militarists are everywhere. Don't go to blockpost, they shoot you. Don't forget if you are killing soldiers, \ntrader is not glad.
Tell about stalkers in detailes.
I'm novice, I don't know about stalker much.
Stalker is a human. No, it's rather intellegent creature, which have abilities to understand and accept rules of the Zone. \nWhen you do this way, you're guaranteed relatively serene life.
Tell me about yourself.
There's any remarkable thing in my story. I got an information about Zone from my friend. I wanted to earn some \nmoney, so here I am.
I came here to find myself, all the more I got a plus- I got nothing to lose, there's nobody awating for me at home.
Have you heard about formations in the Zone?
I'm here not so long, no I've not.Though it could be.
I've heard about "Duty" formation, they're Zone's orderlies.
What do you know about anomalies?
It's fatal areas in the Zone. You should keep away from it.
Anomalies it's wounds on Mother's Earth boby. It is almoust impossible to get out of it, so beware of it.
text in default
text in default
I gotta go
I'm sorry, I gotta go
Let's trade
I just wanted to offer you the same!
I want one more thing.
Thanks, that's all.
No problem
What are stalkers talking about?

Many of them consider Zone to be a living organism, which exists by it's own rules and laws. Hence, a men, who got into \nit is a alien, who doesn't subordinate to it's rules and laws, and Zone tries to get read of him by all means. Naturally, it \nconcern not only stalkers but militarists to...
Stalkers got a saying: the weak is quick dead, the strong is got mad. It will be enough fingers on one hand to count \nheroes who got the center and came back.
What is the place? I don't remember anything...

It's essentially the very start place for novices, who go into Zone for the first time. It's dangerous at night, though those \nmonsters out of the center don't appear here. By the way, be careful, there's a blockpost not far from it.
The lobby of Zone is blockpost. Mostlu you can see ther packs of blind dogs, sometimes mutants out of waste grounds. \nBe careful at night. If you go north way you will reach waste grounds.
